title: Track Awesome Esp Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Esp (agucova/awesome-esp) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: üì∂ A curated list of awesome ESP8266/32 projects and code

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jun 19, 2022
items.content_text:
### Firmware

*   [Sming Framework (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/SmingHub/Sming) - Superb C/C++ IoT Framework with support for ESP8266 and ESP32.

### Tools

*   [NodeMCU Flasher (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-flasher) - The official flashing tool for the NodeMCU OS.

### Projects / Smart Home and IoT

*   [ESPEasy (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/letscontrolit/ESPEasy) - Easily turn ESP modules into multifunction sensor devices for home automation systems.
*   [DoorsignEPD (‚≠ê100)](https://github.com/jamct/DoorsignEPD) - A smart doorsign with an E-Paper display using the ESP32.
*   [HomePoint (‚≠ê648)](https://github.com/sieren/Homepoint) - Control MQTT/HomeKit smart home devices from an ESP32-powered screen.
*   [openHASP](https://www.openhasp.com/) - Control your home automation devices from a customizable touchscreen UI connected via MQTT.

### Projects / LoRa

*   [ESP32-Paxcounter (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/cyberman54/ESP32-Paxcounter#esp32-paxcounter) - Wifi & Bluetooth driven, LoRaWAN enabled, battery powered mini Paxcounter built on cheap ESP32 LoRa IoT boards.
*   [Disaster Radio](https://disaster.radio/) - A disaster-resilient communications network powered by the sun.

### Projects / Music and Audio

*   [Alles (‚≠ê280)](https://github.com/bwhitman/alles) - A many speaker distributed music synthesizer using UDP multicast over WiFi, modeled after the alles machine/AMY.
*   [ESP32-Radio (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/Edzelf/ESP32-Radio) - Internet radio based on ESP32, VS1053 and a TFT screen.
*   [ESPuino (‚≠ê323)](https://github.com/biologist79/ESPuino) - RFID-controlled music player powered by ESP32.
*   [Knobby (‚≠ê193)](https://github.com/quadule/knobby) - A handheld Spotify remote that encourages you to explore unfamiliar music.
*   [PedalinoMini (‚≠ê569)](https://github.com/alf45tar/PedalinoMini) - A wireless MIDI pedal controller for guitarists, built with the ESP32.
*   [Squeezelite-esp32 (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/sle118/squeezelite-esp32) - Streaming audio receiver with multi-room sync, AirPlay, Bluetooth, hardware buttons, display and more.
*   [ThingPulse esp8266-spotify-remote (‚≠ê271)](https://github.com/ThingPulse/esp8266-spotify-remote) - Control your Spotify player from a ESP8266 with color touch display.

### Projects / Smartwatches

*   [mutantW\_V1](https://mutantcybernetics.com/mutantW_V1.html) - An ESP32 based open source smartwatch with 1.7 inch display, WiFi, Bluetooth, NeoPixel and vibration.
*   [StickWatch (‚≠ê90)](https://github.com/eggfly/StickWatch) - A smartwatch module based on the M5Stick, using the ESP32.
*   [Watchy](https://watchy.sqfmi.com) - An open source e-paper watch with lots of options for customization.

### Projects / Others

*   [E-TKT (‚≠ê430)](https://github.com/andreisperid/E-TKT) - An ESP32 powered DIY label maker that mixes both old fashioned and contemporary technology.
*   [FreeTouchDeck (‚≠ê665)](https://github.com/DustinWatts/FreeTouchDeck) - Open source touch macropad and stream control deck with built-in web configurator.
*   [SmartSpin2k (‚≠ê227)](https://github.com/doudar/SmartSpin2k) - Transform your spin bike into a smart trainer with automatic resistance knob control in fitness apps like Zwift.
*   [WirelessPrinting (‚≠ê365)](https://github.com/probonopd/WirelessPrinting) - Print wirelessly from Cura, PrusaSlicer or Slic3r to your 3D printer connected to an ESP module.
*   [WLED](https://kno.wled.ge/) - Control many types of RGB(W) LED strips with an ESP8266 or ESP32 over WiFi.

### Libraries / Others

*   [LVGL](https://lvgl.io) - An open-source graphics library providing everything you need to create embedded GUIs with easy-to-use graphical elements, beautiful visual effects and low memory footprint.
*   [ESP32-audioI2S (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/schreibfaul1/ESP32-audioI2S) - Plays mp3, m4a and wav files from SD card or stream via I2S interface.
*   [HomeSpan (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/HomeSpan/HomeSpan) - A robust and extremely easy-to-use Arduino library for creating your own ESP32-based HomeKit devices.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jun 15, 2022
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Others

*   [LedFx (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/LedFx/LedFx) - A library for using audio input to create realtime light shows. LedFx can control multiple devices and works great with cheap ESP8266 nodes.
items.content_html:
Libraries / Others

  • LedFx (‚≠ê1.6k) - A library for using audio input to create realtime light shows. LedFx can control multiple devices and works great with cheap ESP8266 nodes.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jun 10, 2022
items.content_text:
### Firmware

*   [ESP3D (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/luc-github/ESP3D) - An experimental firmware for 3D Printers, both the ESP32 and 8266.
items.content_html:
Firmware

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jun 02, 2021
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [Tuya-Convert (‚≠ê4.8k)](https://github.com/ct-Open-Source/tuya-convert) - A Wi-Fi firmware flasher ESP8266 that has been pre-loaded with Tuya firmware.
*   [Tasmotizer (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/tasmota/tasmotizer) - A graphical flashing tool for Tasmota firmware. Can manage Wi-Fi & MQTT settings, modules & templates.

### Projects / Smart Home and IoT

*   [Tasmota](https://tasmota.github.io/docs/) - An alternative firmware for Sonoff & other ESP8266/ESP32 devices. Includes a large collection of sensor drivers & integrates with [Home Assistant](https://www.home-assistant.io/) natively or via MQTT.
items.content_html:
Tools

  • Tuya-Convert (‚≠ê4.8k) - A Wi-Fi firmware flasher ESP8266 that has been pre-loaded with Tuya firmware.
  • Tasmotizer (‚≠ê1.5k) - A graphical flashing tool for Tasmota firmware. Can manage Wi-Fi & MQTT settings, modules & templates.

Projects / Smart Home and IoT

  • Tasmota - An alternative firmware for Sonoff & other ESP8266/ESP32 devices. Includes a large collection of sensor drivers & integrates with Home Assistant natively or via MQTT.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jan 22, 2021
items.content_text:
### Projects / LoRa

*   [Meshtastic](https://www.meshtastic.org/) - ESP32 LoRA boards as secure, long battery life, mesh GPS communicators.

### Libraries / Others

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Aug 01, 2020
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Others

*   [painlessMesh (‚≠ê540)](https://github.com/gmag11/painlessMesh) - A library that takes care of the particulars of creating a simple mesh network using ESP8266 and ESP32 hardware.
*   [WifiEspNow (‚≠ê266)](https://github.com/yoursunny/WifiEspNow) - Arduino library for [ESP-NOW](https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esp-idf/en/latest/esp32/api-reference/network/esp_now.html), a connectionless WiFi communication protocol defined by [Espressif](https://github.com/espressif).
items.content_html:
Libraries / Others

  • painlessMesh (‚≠ê540) - A library that takes care of the particulars of creating a simple mesh network using ESP8266 and ESP32 hardware.
  • WifiEspNow (‚≠ê266) - Arduino library for ESP-NOW, a connectionless WiFi communication protocol defined by Espressif.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jan 31, 2020
items.content_text:
### Projects / InfoSec

*   [ESP32Marauder (‚≠ê8k)](https://github.com/justcallmekoko/ESP32Marauder) - An integrated suite of offensive and defensive tools for WiFi and Bluetooth.
items.content_html:
Projects / InfoSec

  • ESP32Marauder (‚≠ê8k) - An integrated suite of offensive and defensive tools for WiFi and Bluetooth.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jan 22, 2020
items.content_text:
### Firmware

*   [MongooseOS (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/cesanta/mongoose-os) - An IoT specific firmware, with both C and JS. Available for the ESP32/8266.

### Tools

*   [ESPTool-ck (‚≠ê370)](https://github.com/igrr/esptool-ck) - A CLI tool for flashing in the ESP8266.
*   [ESPTool-gui (‚≠ê197)](https://github.com/Rodmg/esptool-gui) - A flashing GUI tool based on ESPTool-ck.
*   [LuaNode (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/Nicholas3388/LuaNode) - A lua-only SDK for 32/8266.

### Projects / Smart Home and IoT

*   [OpenMQTTGateway (‚≠ê3.8k)](https://github.com/1technophile/OpenMQTTGateway) - An implementation of a multiprotocol MQTT gateway for both ESP's among other devices.
*   [ESPHome](https://esphome.io/) - A full-featured system for controlling ESP's through simple yet powerful configuration files and Home Automation systems.
*   [Sonoff-Homekit (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/Gruppio/Sonoff-Homekit) - An alternative firmware for Sonoff devices (and other 8266 devices) which allows control through Apple's Homekit.
*   [EPaperWeatherDisplay (‚≠ê155)](https://github.com/henri98/esp32-e-paper-weatherdisplay) - A very cute e-ink weather display using the ESP32.
*   [SuperGreenOS (‚≠ê193)](https://github.com/supergreenlab/SuperGreenOS) - A full-featured home farming automation software for the ESP32.

### Projects / InfoSec

*   [ESP32-BLECollector (‚≠ê323)](https://github.com/tobozo/ESP32-BLECollector) - A wardriving device which displays BLE devices and collects data from them, all in a nice screen interface.
*   [ArduinoPcap (‚≠ê442)](https://github.com/spacehuhn/ArduinoPcap) - A library which allows generation of .pcap files with network traffic, for both ESP's.
*   [WiFi Satellite](https://hackaday.io/project/28831-wifi-satellite-34c3) - A giant Wifi "satellite" that can monitor all 14 2.4Ghz channels using, well, 14 ESP32s.
*   [ESP8266 Deauther (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/spacehuhn/esp8266_deauther) - A very cool pseudojammer (deauther) of Wifi networks that uses the ESP8266.
*   [PacketMonitor (‚≠ê379)](https://github.com/spacehuhn/PacketMonitor32) - A beautiful OLED monitor for packet activity in a WiFi channel. Two versions for each ESP.
*   [WiFiDuck (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/spacehuhn/WiFiDuck) - A wireless-enabled keystroke injector, analogous, but even more awesome than the Rubber Ducky.
*   [ESP8266 Beacon Spam (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/spacehuhn/esp8266_beaconSpam) - Want to confuse people? This device creates hundreds of fake WiFi networks.
*   [DeauthDetector (‚≠ê861)](https://github.com/spacehuhn/DeauthDetector) - A small device that shines a light if it detects a WiFi deauth attack. Made by the same guy as the last six projects.

### Projects / Biomedical

*   [HeartyPatch](https://heartypatch.protocentral.com/) - A wearable BLE and WiFi connected ECG-HR patch which uses the ESP32.
*   [HealthyPi v4](https://www.crowdsupply.com/protocentral/healthypi-v4-unplugged) - An amazing open source vital signs monitor that can monitor ECG, respiration, pulse oximetry and body temperature, all run by an ESP32.

### Projects / Others

*   [SoftRF (‚≠ê882)](https://github.com/lyusupov/SoftRF) - A DIY aviation proximity awareness system that can be used in UAV projects.
*   [Retro ESP32 (‚≠ê648)](https://github.com/retro-esp32/RetroESP32) - An extremely cool launcher for the Odroid Go (with the ESP32), which allows emulating several retro consoles.
*   [DroneBridge (‚≠ê532)](https://github.com/DroneBridge/ESP32) - An implementation of DroneBridge, a signal link for drones and UAV's on the ESP32.

### Libraries / Others

*   [Wasm3 (‚≠ê7.6k)](https://github.com/wasm3/wasm3) - A lightning fast WebAssembly interpreter designed for embedded devices, compatible with both ESP's.
*   [ESP-Dash (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/ayushsharma82/ESP-DASH) - Beautiful and fast framework for creating remote dashboards in the 8266/32. No internet required.
*   [GUIslice (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/ImpulseAdventure/GUIslice) - A drag and drop GUI framework for several devices and screen controllers. Compatible with 8266 and 32.
*   [MicroWebSrv2 (‚≠ê685)](https://github.com/jczic/MicroWebSrv2) - A very powerful MicroPython web server which can be used in the ESP32.
*   [TTS (‚≠ê205)](https://github.com/jscrane/TTS) - A somehow good text to speech library for several Arduino devices, both ESP's included.
*   [Koyn (‚≠ê66)](https://github.com/elkrem/koyn) - A decentralized Bitcoin library for the ESP32 and the ESP8266.
*   [UTFT-ESP (‚≠ê91)](https://github.com/gnulabis/UTFT-ESP) - UTFT Support for the ESP32/8266.
*   [TinyGSM (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/vshymanskyy/TinyGSM) - A quick and simple Arduino library for interaction with GSM modules which can also control the 8266 through AT commands.
*   [mJS (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/cesanta/mjs) - A lightweight and restricted JS engine that is used by MongooseOS, compatible on the 32 and 8266.
*   [ESPUI (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/s00500/ESPUI) - A simply library for making interactive web interfaces for both ESP's.
*   [ESP32 ePaper (‚≠ê232)](https://github.com/loboris/ESP32_ePaper_example) - A full-featured library for using ePaper modules with the ESP32.
*   [TinyUPnP (‚≠ê106)](https://github.com/ofekp/TinyUPnP) - A lightweight UPnP IGD library for automatic port forwarding on the 8266 and 32.
*   [Esp32SSHClient (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/J-Rios/Arduino-esp32sshclient) - A library that implements a SSH client in the ESP32.
items.content_html:
Firmware

  • MongooseOS (‚≠ê2.6k) - An IoT specific firmware, with both C and JS. Available for the ESP32/8266.

Tools

  • ESPTool-ck (‚≠ê370) - A CLI tool for flashing in the ESP8266.
  • ESPTool-gui (‚≠ê197) - A flashing GUI tool based on ESPTool-ck.
  • LuaNode (‚≠ê1.2k) - A lua-only SDK for 32/8266.

Projects / Smart Home and IoT

  • OpenMQTTGateway (‚≠ê3.8k) - An implementation of a multiprotocol MQTT gateway for both ESP's among other devices.
  • ESPHome - A full-featured system for controlling ESP's through simple yet powerful configuration files and Home Automation systems.
  • Sonoff-Homekit (‚≠ê1k) - An alternative firmware for Sonoff devices (and other 8266 devices) which allows control through Apple's Homekit.
  • EPaperWeatherDisplay (‚≠ê155) - A very cute e-ink weather display using the ESP32.
  • SuperGreenOS (‚≠ê193) - A full-featured home farming automation software for the ESP32.

Projects / InfoSec

  • ESP32-BLECollector (‚≠ê323) - A wardriving device which displays BLE devices and collects data from them, all in a nice screen interface.
  • ArduinoPcap (‚≠ê442) - A library which allows generation of .pcap files with network traffic, for both ESP's.
  • WiFi Satellite - A giant Wifi "satellite" that can monitor all 14 2.4Ghz channels using, well, 14 ESP32s.
  • ESP8266 Deauther (‚≠ê14k) - A very cool pseudojammer (deauther) of Wifi networks that uses the ESP8266.
  • PacketMonitor (‚≠ê379) - A beautiful OLED monitor for packet activity in a WiFi channel. Two versions for each ESP.
  • WiFiDuck (‚≠ê2.3k) - A wireless-enabled keystroke injector, analogous, but even more awesome than the Rubber Ducky.
  • ESP8266 Beacon Spam (‚≠ê1.1k) - Want to confuse people? This device creates hundreds of fake WiFi networks.
  • DeauthDetector (‚≠ê861) - A small device that shines a light if it detects a WiFi deauth attack. Made by the same guy as the last six projects.

Projects / Biomedical

  • HeartyPatch - A wearable BLE and WiFi connected ECG-HR patch which uses the ESP32.
  • HealthyPi v4 - An amazing open source vital signs monitor that can monitor ECG, respiration, pulse oximetry and body temperature, all run by an ESP32.

Projects / Others

  • SoftRF (‚≠ê882) - A DIY aviation proximity awareness system that can be used in UAV projects.
  • Retro ESP32 (‚≠ê648) - An extremely cool launcher for the Odroid Go (with the ESP32), which allows emulating several retro consoles.
  • DroneBridge (‚≠ê532) - An implementation of DroneBridge, a signal link for drones and UAV's on the ESP32.

Libraries / Others

  • Wasm3 (‚≠ê7.6k) - A lightning fast WebAssembly interpreter designed for embedded devices, compatible with both ESP's.
  • ESP-Dash (‚≠ê1k) - Beautiful and fast framework for creating remote dashboards in the 8266/32. No internet required.
  • GUIslice (‚≠ê1.3k) - A drag and drop GUI framework for several devices and screen controllers. Compatible with 8266 and 32.
  • MicroWebSrv2 (‚≠ê685) - A very powerful MicroPython web server which can be used in the ESP32.
  • TTS (‚≠ê205) - A somehow good text to speech library for several Arduino devices, both ESP's included.
  • Koyn (‚≠ê66) - A decentralized Bitcoin library for the ESP32 and the ESP8266.
  • UTFT-ESP (‚≠ê91) - UTFT Support for the ESP32/8266.
  • TinyGSM (‚≠ê2.1k) - A quick and simple Arduino library for interaction with GSM modules which can also control the 8266 through AT commands.
  • mJS (‚≠ê2k) - A lightweight and restricted JS engine that is used by MongooseOS, compatible on the 32 and 8266.
  • ESPUI (‚≠ê1k) - A simply library for making interactive web interfaces for both ESP's.
  • ESP32 ePaper (‚≠ê232) - A full-featured library for using ePaper modules with the ESP32.
  • TinyUPnP (‚≠ê106) - A lightweight UPnP IGD library for automatic port forwarding on the 8266 and 32.
  • Esp32SSHClient (‚≠ê47) - A library that implements a SSH client in the ESP32.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Dec 02, 2019
items.content_text:
### Firmware

*   [ESPBasic](http://www.esp8266basic.com/) - A BASIC firmware for easy and wireless programming, ready for the 8266.

### Libraries / Others

*   [ESP8266Wifi (‚≠ê460)](https://github.com/ekstrand/ESP8266wifi) - Simple Arduino Wifi library for the 8266.
items.content_html:
Firmware

  • ESPBasic - A BASIC firmware for easy and wireless programming, ready for the 8266.

Libraries / Others

  • ESP8266Wifi (‚≠ê460) - Simple Arduino Wifi library for the 8266.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Oct 04, 2018
items.content_text:
### Firmware

*   [NodeMCU (‚≠ê7.8k)](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-firmware) - An eLua-based firmware for the ESP8266.
*   [RT-Thread (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/RT-Thread/rt-thread) - Chinese open source firmware available for the ESP32.

### Tools

*   [PlatformIO (‚≠ê8.4k)](https://github.com/platformio/platformio-core) - Cross Platform IDE and Debugger that supports both the ESP32 and ESP8266.

### Libraries / Others

*   [Homie8266 (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/marvinroger/homie-esp8266) - Framework implementation of the Homie protocol for the 8266.
*   [ESP\_mqtt (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/tuanpmt/esp_mqtt) - MQTT helper library for the ESP8266.
*   [IRremoteESP8266 (‚≠ê3.2k)](https://github.com/markszabo/IRremoteESP8266) - Emit and receive IR signals in the ESP8266.
*   [esphomelib (‚≠ê545)](https://github.com/OttoWinter/esphomelib) - Framework to integrate with HomeAssistant in the 8266.
*   [Free802.11 (‚≠ê529)](https://github.com/Jeija/esp32free80211) - Library to emit arbitrary 802.11 signals with the ESP32.
*   [TFTLibrary (‚≠ê611)](https://github.com/loboris/ESP32_TFT_library) - TFT compatibility for the ESP32.
*   [ESPAudio (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/earlephilhower/ESP8266Audio) - Library for playing a diverse range of audio formats in the ESP8266/ESP32.
*   [AsyncTCP (‚≠ê777)](https://github.com/me-no-dev/ESPAsyncTCP) - Asynchronous TCP Library for both the 8266 and the 32.
*   [ESP-HomeKit (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/maximkulkin/esp-homekit) - Homekit implementation for 8266 on RTOS.
*   [ESPHelper (‚≠ê331)](https://github.com/ItKindaWorks/ESPHelper) - MQTT and Wi-fi automation-oriented library for the 8266.
*   [ESPHelper/32 (‚≠ê53)](https://github.com/ItKindaWorks/ESPHelper32) - Port of the ESPHelper library for the 32.
*   [WiFiESP (‚≠ê563)](https://github.com/bportaluri/WiFiEsp) - Arduino library for Wifi management, client/server for 8266 board.
items.content_html:
Firmware

  • NodeMCU (‚≠ê7.8k) - An eLua-based firmware for the ESP8266.
  • RT-Thread (‚≠ê11k) - Chinese open source firmware available for the ESP32.

Tools

  • PlatformIO (‚≠ê8.4k) - Cross Platform IDE and Debugger that supports both the ESP32 and ESP8266.

Libraries / Others

  • Homie8266 (‚≠ê1.4k) - Framework implementation of the Homie protocol for the 8266.
  • ESP_mqtt (‚≠ê1.1k) - MQTT helper library for the ESP8266.
  • IRremoteESP8266 (‚≠ê3.2k) - Emit and receive IR signals in the ESP8266.
  • esphomelib (‚≠ê545) - Framework to integrate with HomeAssistant in the 8266.
  • Free802.11 (‚≠ê529) - Library to emit arbitrary 802.11 signals with the ESP32.
  • TFTLibrary (‚≠ê611) - TFT compatibility for the ESP32.
  • ESPAudio (‚≠ê2.2k) - Library for playing a diverse range of audio formats in the ESP8266/ESP32.
  • AsyncTCP (‚≠ê777) - Asynchronous TCP Library for both the 8266 and the 32.
  • ESP-HomeKit (‚≠ê1.2k) - Homekit implementation for 8266 on RTOS.
  • ESPHelper (‚≠ê331) - MQTT and Wi-fi automation-oriented library for the 8266.
  • ESPHelper/32 (‚≠ê53) - Port of the ESPHelper library for the 32.
  • WiFiESP (‚≠ê563) - Arduino library for Wifi management, client/server for 8266 board.

items.title: Awesome Esp Updates on Jan 13, 2018
items.content_text:
### Firmware

*   [Espressif AT](http://bbs.espressif.com/) - The default vanilla firmware for the ESP8266.
*   [Frankenstein (‚≠ê320)](https://github.com/nekromant/esp8266-frankenstein) - A quick and dirty firmware with cool features for the ESP8266.
*   [DeviceHive](https://devicehive.com/) - A firmware made as a client for DeviceHive's IoT data platform, only for the 8266.

### Tools

*   [ESP Flash Tool](http://espressif.com/en/support/download/other-tools) - The vanilla firmware flasher for both ESP's.
*   [Arduino Core/8266 (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/esp8266/arduino) - The Arduino core for the ESP8266.
*   [Arduino Core/32 (‚≠ê15k)](https://github.com/espressif/arduino-esp32) - The other Arduino core for the ESP32.
*   [ESPTool (‚≠ê6k)](https://github.com/espressif/esptool) - Espressif's command line tool for bootloader comms in both ESP's.
*   [ESP-Open-SDK (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/pfalcon/esp-open-sdk) - An open SDK for the ESP8266.
*   [Arduino FS Plugin (‚≠ê728)](https://github.com/esp8266/arduino-esp8266fs-plugin) - An Arduino plugin for filesystem uploads in the 8266.
items.content_html:
Firmware

  • Espressif AT - The default vanilla firmware for the ESP8266.
  • Frankenstein (‚≠ê320) - A quick and dirty firmware with cool features for the ESP8266.
  • DeviceHive - A firmware made as a client for DeviceHive's IoT data platform, only for the 8266.

Tools

  • ESP Flash Tool - The vanilla firmware flasher for both ESP's.
  • Arduino Core/8266 (‚≠ê16k) - The Arduino core for the ESP8266.
  • Arduino Core/32 (‚≠ê15k) - The other Arduino core for the ESP32.
  • ESPTool (‚≠ê6k) - Espressif's command line tool for bootloader comms in both ESP's.
  • ESP-Open-SDK (‚≠ê2k) - An open SDK for the ESP8266.
  • Arduino FS Plugin (‚≠ê728) - An Arduino plugin for filesystem uploads in the 8266.
